name: Obesity Predictor
description: Machine learning web app that predicts whether an individual has normal weight or has any level of overweight or obesity

name: String Art
description: String art is a web platform that displays the art of printable ascii characters using various font styles. It also offers both terminal and file output options.

name: Fetch It
description: Fetch It is a web platform that displays manipulated data from a given API. The API majorly consist of information about different artists

name: Spark Bridge
description: Spark Bridge is a Django-based web application that connects customers with service providers for various services and maintenance tasks. Kindly note that it is still under development improvements.
